mapper.insert: insert into organz (ORGNZ_NO, ORGNZ_NM, ENG_ORGNZ_NM, ORGNZ_DSTNCT, HMPAGE_URL, TEL_NO, FAX_NO, ADDR, DETAIL_ADDR, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO, MAP_PROF_NM, LAB_INTRO, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT, HMNBRD_DSTNCT ) values (null, #{orgnzNm}, #{engOrgnzNm}, #{orgnzDstnct},#{hmpageUrl},#{telNo },#{faxNo},#{addr},#{detailAddr},#{prntsOrgnzNo},#{mapProfNm},#{labIntro},#{rsrchrInfoText},#{hmnbrdDstnct})
insert into resrch_acrslt (RESRCH_ACRSLT_NO, ORGNZ_NO, ACRSLT_DSTNCT, REGST_DT, RESRCH_YYCL, RESRCH_TEXT ) values (null, #{orgnzNo}, #{acrsltDstnct}, now() ,#{resrchYycl},#{resrchText})
mapper.update: update organz set orgnz_nm=#{orgnzNm},ENG_ORGNZ_NM=#{engOrgnzNm}, ORGNZ_DSTNCT=#{orgnzDstnct}, HMPAGE_URL=#{hmpageUrl}, TEL_NO=#{telNo}, FAX_NO=#{faxNo}, ADDR=#{addr}, DETAIL_ADDR=#{detailAddr}, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO=#{prntsOrgnzNo}, MAP_PROF_NM=#{mapProfNm}, LAB_INTRO=#{labIntro}, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT=#{rsrchrInfoText} ,HMNBRD_DSTNCT=#{hmnbrdDstnct} where orgnz_no=#{orgnzNo}
mapper.select: SELECT o2.orgnz_no orgnzNo, hierarchy_sys_connect_by_textpath('\n', o2.orgnz_no) AS orgnzNm, o2.ENG_ORGNZ_NM engOrgnzNm, o2.ORGNZ_DSTNCT orgnzDstnct, o2.HMPAGE_URL hmpageUrl, o2.TEL_NO telNo, o2.FAX_NO faxNo, o2.ADDR addr, o2.DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr, o2.PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO prntsOrgnzNo, o2.MAP_PROF_NM mapProfNm, o2.LAB_INTRO labIntro, o2.RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT rsrchrInfoText, o2.HMNBRD_DSTNCT hmnbrdDstnct FROM (SELECT hierarchy_connect_by_parent_eq_prior_id_with_level(ORGNZ_NO, 4) AS id, CAST(@level AS SIGNED) AS level FROM (SELECT @start_with := 0, @id := @start_with, @level := 0 ) vars, organz WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) o1 JOIN organz o2 ON o2.ORGNZ_NO = o1.id where ORGNZ_DSTNCT='연구실'

select orgnz_no orgnzNo, orgnz_nm orgnzNm, ENG_ORGNZ_NM engOrgnzNm, ORGNZ_DSTNCT orgnzDstnct, HMPAGE_URL hmpageUrl, TEL_NO telNo, FAX_NO faxNo, ADDR addr, DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO prntsOrgnzNo, MAP_PROF_NM mapProfNm, LAB_INTRO labIntro, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT rsrchrInfoText, HMNBRD_DSTNCT hmnbrdDstnct from organz where ORGNZ_DSTNCT='연구실' and orgnz_no = #{no};
